HelpBalloon.title: Tracking with cookie
HelpBalloon.content:
Please note that before setting cookies for marketing purposes, you should obtain the active consent of the recipient (e.g. as part of the registration process) and inform the customer about the purpose and duration of the storage. Your privacy statement should also be amended accordingly.
The prerequisite for retargeting is that you have previously integrated the EMM measuring points into your website.
